rooms.description: Wide and open space with wheelchair accessible entrance, ramps integrated for smooth access.
Spacious open plan living area with modern finishes, ample natural light through large windows placed according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Separate dining area adjacent to the kitchen; designed with accessibility in mind and comfortable seating arrangements.
Modern kitchen with integrated appliances, barrier-free layout for wheelchair access, and energy-efficient design.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom; designed with wide doorways and accessible fixtures.
Second bedroom, also wheelchair accessible, with ample storage space and natural lighting as per Vastu guidelines.
Dedicated library area with comfortable seating, adjustable shelves; placed in a quiet zone according to Vastu principles for concentration and positive energy.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp, designed with large, clear glass panels to promote natural light.
Large windows placed per Vastu directions for optimum sunlight and ventilation.
